description:
Used to set the game to unreliable and back to reliable if required due to any serious unforeseen situations with coverage, stats, or other circumstances. Upon match starting and if no previous suspend action is sent, Reliable is assumed.
This action is *confirmed automatically* and will not be followed up with a confirmation message.
title: suspend

Confirmed.description: Action confirmation status. This indicates an action that actually happened, as opposed to _possible_ actions, however the final confirmation is still pending and will be sent with the same action ID, and potentially more information related to the action. An unconfirmed event is closer in time to the event happening, as confirmation could be delayed by events on field. Take this in account when handling the events
Confirmed.title: Confirmed

IsAnalyst.description: True if the sender of the message is an analyst
IsAnalyst.title: Is Analyst

IsSupervisor.description: True if the sender of the message is a supervisor
IsSupervisor.title: Is Supervisor

Locked.description: True if the scout is locked out of the fixture
Locked.title: Locked

Reliable.description: True if the match information is reliable
Reliable.title: Reliable
